title: My Sister Picked up the Male Lead - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Drama   Fantasy   Romance   Shoujo   Tragedy
tags: Abusive Characters   Adapted to Manhwa   Age Regression   Appearance Different from Actual Age   Aristocracy   Curses   European Ambience   Female Protagonist   Monsters   Reincarnated in Another World   Reincarnation   Sword And Magic
author: Moon Sihyun   문시현
description:
I couldn’t believe what I was seeing.

“Sister, what is ‘that’?”

“That’ is your friend. Didn’t you say you wanted a friend?”

One day, my sister brought home a man.

The fact that she brought home a man alone is shocking but what’s more shocking is that this man… is someone who has lost his memories after being chased by the Imperial Palace. This man is someone who was a child during the day but a man at night.

The man is none other than the cursed magician ‘Lennox Iberich.’

“I think I should continue getting hurt.”

“Why?”

“Then, Amy will continue to be by my side.”

Why is this man dangerous?

Even though during the day, he’s a lovely and cute puppy,

“You like my naked body, huh?”

“Wait a minute, can’t you say it properly? It’s a misunderstanding!”

“Why is it a misunderstanding? Didn’t you touch my body? You didn’t even give me any clothes.”

“That is true but the reason why I didn’t…”

“So you do like me naked.”

“No, I said no!”

At night, he’s a wild and dangerous wolf.>
